title: Community Garden Workshop
description: Join us for a hands-on workshop where we'll learn about sustainable gardening practices and work together on our community garden plots.

title: Eco-Feminist Discussion Circle
description: A monthly gathering to discuss eco-feminist perspectives on current environmental issues and share ideas for community action.

title: Biodiversity Monitoring Walk
description: Learn how to identify and document local plant and animal species while contributing to our biodiversity monitoring project.

title: Sustainable Living Lecture Series
description: Expert speakers share practical knowledge on various aspects of sustainable living, from energy conservation to zero-waste practices.
